TextView.android:text: The Stepwell Square is a panoramic, all encompassing mini-architectural tour in itself with the spectacularly proportioned Toorji Ka Jhalra at its epi-centre. Indeed, almost three hundred years of Jodhpur's building traditions are not only on magnificent view but can actually be experienced; from the intricately carved 18th Century Pol (Entrance) of the historic Nath Haveli to its no less distinctive 1930s 'Jodhpur Art Deco' residential wing.
